projects: [{"title":"Power MOSFET segmentation in Current-mode Hysteretic Controlled DC-DC Buck Converters","start_date":"Jul 2020","end_date":"Apr 2021","description":"Improved power efficiency of the DC-DC buck converter by using power MOSFET segmentation technique over a wide range of load current with improvement in transient response."},{"title":"Designed real time automatic GSM based starter for motor pump","start_date":"Jun 2020","end_date":"Jul 2020","description":"Designed an Automatic SMS based starter for motor pump . It is used by farmers who have fields far away from their home."},{"title":"AHB to APB bridge for AMBA protol using RTL","start_date":"May 2020","end_date":"Jun 2020","description":"Designed AHB to APB bridge for Advanced Micro controller Bus Architecture using RTL coding in SoC."},{"title":"Designed signal conditioning circuit for LVDT ","start_date":"Feb 2020","end_date":"May 2020","description":"Designed accurate signal condition circuit and interfaced with LCD for Linear Variable Displacement Transducer."},{"title":"Automatic dam gate control system by using ARM ","start_date":"Jul 2017","end_date":"May 2018","description":"Designed an automatic dam gate control system by using ARM"}]
